TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AppearanceEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class AppearanceEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是一个派生自的编辑器控件类，并用于编辑影响相关联的外观的属性或其他服务器控件。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated or other server control. 控件使最终用户能够编辑的多个 UI 属性控件。The control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a control. 将显示在页后，可以编辑每个属性值的控件的类型是相邻的单元格的下表中列出的。The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table. |属性Property|用于编辑属性的控件Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| ||A控件用于设置标题的文本。A control is used to set the text for the title.| ||A控件用于选择使用哪种类型的标题边框选项。A control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| ||A控件用于选择在页面的内容流动的方向。A control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| ||A控件用于设置高度，数值和一个控件用于选择的单位。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||A控件用于设置高度，数值和一个控件用于选择的单位。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||A控件用于指示是否隐藏控件。A control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| 控件变为可见的仅当 Web 部件页处于编辑模式，以及时特定控件已被选定以进行编辑。The control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 控件和所有其他一样控制，驻留在区域。The control, like all other controls, resides in an zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含控件，和控件不能放在任何其他类型的区域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 类具有最少属性集。The class has a minimal set of properties. 属性用于获取或设置控件是否可见时，显示为标题的字符串。The property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible. 属性设置从的继承的属性控制，以便默认控件接收焦点内的控件是相同的基中默认控件。The property sets the inherited property from the control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the control is the same as the default in the base control. 类还具有两个重要的方法。The class also has two important methods. 方法重写基方法从类。The method overrides the base method from the class. 此方法是关键的因为它启用获取的属性值从它是编辑，并将它们分配到编辑器控件中的字段的控件。This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control. 方法也是很重要，因为它会在编辑控件中，用户设置的值并更新正在编辑的控件上的这些属性值。The method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited. 在大多数情况下应通过声明以页持久性格式使用控件``内的元素``元素，后者又包含由``在网页上的元素。In most cases the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 若要编辑其他属性和行为控件，你可以使用其他随附了 Web 部件控件集的控件。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 这些控件包括、 ，和。These controls include the , the , and the . 提供控件应提供编辑所需的大多数编辑功能控件，但你还可以通过继承创建自定义编辑器控件类。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 若要提高可访问性，控件呈现在`
`元素。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`元素进行分组的相关中用于编辑的控件集控件，并促进各 visual （如普通 Web 浏览器） 和面向语音的用户代理的这些控件之间的选项卡式的导航 （例如屏幕读取软件）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明控制在网页上，并使其可以编辑的多个 UI 属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declare an control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 网页包含控件和控件，以及对自定义的引用控件。A Web page that contains an control and an control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 一个包含自定义类控件。A class that contains a custom control. - 该示例的工作原理时加载浏览器中说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 用户控件的源代码来自于另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 对于此代码示例正常工作，你需要获取该用户控件从.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 下面的代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的声明性引用具有子控件``包含对的声明性引用的元素控件。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to an control. 此外，页面引用自定义控件，并使用`Register`程序集指令和``该控件的元素。Also, the page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义类名为`TextDisplayWebPart`，在 Web 页引用。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**下拉控件，以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch to edit mode. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见时，你可以看到控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 如果在编辑 UI 和单击进行某些更改时**应用**按钮，你可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表，以返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

summary.span: Saves the values from an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

span.span: Saves the values from an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on a control. 就是当用户单击按钮都表示为确定或应用谓词中编辑的用户界面 (UI)。It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 方法的目的是保存用户已设置的值中关联的相应属性的控件控件。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 引用关联的控件在继承属性。The associated control is referenced in the inherited property. 方法尝试设置以下属性关联控件：The method attempts to set the following properties on the associated control: - - - - - -

exception.span: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the control that is being edited:

span.span: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the control that is being edited:

summary.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

summary.span: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.

span.span: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.

value.span: 包含的 ID 的字符串默认中获得焦点的控件控件。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在上一个关键方法控件。The method is a critical method on an control. 它实现方法从基类中，从关联中检索的当前值控制，并更新中的控件使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 调用方法每当中关联的值控件可能已更改。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 有关控件，包含控件调用区域方法，以便中的值控件始终中关联的值与同步控件。For an control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一种情况其中调用方法时控件进入编辑模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

para.span: Web 部件控件集调用中继承的方法方法，因此，如果在用户后发生的任何更改上次查看之前编辑控件 （例如，共享的管理用户所做的更改到控件，会影响所有用户），这些更改将在编辑过程非常明显。

span.span: The Web Parts control set calls the method within the inherited method, so that if any changes occurred after the user last viewed the control prior to editing (for example, a shared administrative user made changes to the control that would affect all users), those changes would be evident during the editing process.

para.span: 如果创建自定义控件，则可以按照相同方法，并调用方法从继承方法，以确保所有介入的更改同步的但不需要执行此操作。

span.span: If you create a custom control, you can follow the same approach, and call the method from the inherited method to ensure that any intervening changes are synchronized, but it is not necessary to do this.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 一个字符串，使用为该控件的标题。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是由 Web 部件控件集提供的计算的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的标题栏中显示属性值控制当控件是否处于编辑模式可见。The property value is displayed in the title bar of an control when the control is visible in edit mode. 当控件被声明在页中时，你可以设置的值`Title`属性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，用于描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性类型的特定于区域性的默认值。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例演示如何设置标题中页持久性格式``页中声明元素。The code example shows how to set the title in page persistence format when the `` element is declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**编辑模式**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 你可以单击的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当可见的编辑的用户界面 (UI) 时，你可以看到控件的自定义标题。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control's custom title.
